All Projects

Taskvare

iOSAndroid

TaskVare is a task and employee management app where employees can log hours, request different types of leaves, and track progress, while admins can assign projects, split tasks, and approve or reject completed work.

StackUp

iOSAndroid

StackUp is a savings and financial tracking app that lets users set goals, link bank accounts, add payment details, and monitor progress with real-time stats and charts.

iOSAndroid

A cross-platform laundry booking app built with Flutter, featuring real-time order tracking, secure payments, and push notifications for seamless user experience

iOSAndroid

A simple e-commerce app with cart management (add/remove), abandoned cart recovery, secure payment gateway, and Shopify integration for product sync and order tracking.
